thread.title: BRIEF-Century Sage Scientific Holdings Sees FY ‍Net Loss Of Not Less Than RMB130 Million​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Century Sage Scientific Holdings Sees FY ‍Net Loss Of Not Less Than RMB130 Million​

organizations.name: reuters) - century sage scientific holdings ltd

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Century Sage Scientific Holdings Ltd :
* ‍EXPECTED TO RECORD A NET LOSS OF NOT LESS THAN RMB130 MILLION FOR FY​
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO WRITE- OFF OF RECEIVABLES OF APPROXIMATELY RMB160 MILLION DURING YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
